title: The Great Trendsignation 2/23: LGBTQ+ Rights, NYC Subway, Queen Elizabeth, Teflon Don, Tom Hardy, March TV
itunes:title: The Great Trendsignation 2/23: LGBTQ+ Rights, NYC Subway, Queen Elizabeth, Teflon Don, Tom Hardy, March TV
description:
In this edition of The Great Trendsignation, Jack and Miles discuss Red States attacking LGBTQ+ rights, NYC testing subway platform barriers, Queen Elizabeth NOT being dead, the dirt refusing to stick to Teflon Don, the behind the scenes drama on 'Mad Max: Fury Road', and March (TV) Madness!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
